Title: A.1 - Audit current initialization flow
Description: Map the current flow through BoardManager.initialize(), loadData(), and related methods. Document what happens and in what order.

Title: A.2 - Fix cold start board loading
Description: Ensure app launches → board loads → playable state every time without manual restart.

Title: A.3 - Eliminate race conditions
Description: Identify and fix any async race conditions in the initialization sequence. Grid must be fully loaded before UI renders.

Title: A.4 - Fix background resume state
Description: App backgrounded → resumed → state preserved correctly. Test didChangeAppLifecycleState handlers.

Title: A.5 - Verify saveState/restoreState
Description: Ensure saveState() and restoreState() work reliably. Handle edge case where device kills app while backgrounded.

Title: A.6 - Fix daily board rollover
Description: Midnight rollover loads new board without restart. isBoardExpired() logic works correctly across timezones.

Title: A.7 - Prevent duplicate loads
Description: Loading only triggers once per session. No duplicate API calls for same board. Add loading guards/flags.

Title: A.8 - Ensure UI data integrity
Description: UI never sees half-loaded data. Grid waits for complete data. Loading indicator shown until ready.

Title: A.9 - Add error state handling
Description: Display proper error state if load fails. User can retry or gets helpful message.

Title: A.10 - Test on Android device
Description: Full end-to-end testing on Android physical device or emulator.

Title: A.11 - Test on iOS device
Description: Full end-to-end testing on iOS physical device or simulator.

Title: B.1 - Remove web-specific code from main.dart
Description: Strip out all kIsWeb conditionals and web-only logic from main.dart.

Title: B.2 - Stub out LoginDialog
Description: Remove or stub LoginDialog - will be replaced by Firebase Auth in Phase C.

Title: B.3 - Stub out RegisterDialog
Description: Remove or stub RegisterDialog - will be replaced by Firebase Auth in Phase C.

Title: B.4 - Remove password dialogs
Description: Remove PasswordRecoveryDialog, ResetPasswordDialog - no longer needed.

Title: B.5 - Remove WebUtils
Description: Remove or stub WebUtils conditional logic since web not supported.

Title: B.6 - Audit and remove unused imports
Description: Clean up all unused imports and dead files across the codebase.

Title: B.7 - Design GameController class
Description: Design a unified GameController or master object to hold all game state.

Title: B.8 - Implement GameController
Description: Create GameController that handles: board, tiles, score, spelled words, notifiers.

Title: B.9 - Migrate state to GameController
Description: Move scattered state from various managers into GameController.

Title: B.10 - Simplify WideScreen parameters
Description: Reduce objects passed to WideScreen by using GameController.

Title: B.11 - Simplify NarrowScreen parameters
Description: Reduce objects passed to NarrowScreen by using GameController.

Title: B.12 - Replace callbacks with GameController methods
Description: Screens read from GameController, not passed individual props.

Title: B.13 - Backend: Document active endpoints
Description: Document which reword-api endpoints remain active after cleanup.

Title: B.14 - Backend: Remove/disable registration endpoints
Description: Remove or disable user registration endpoints from routes/user.py.

Title: B.15 - Review folder structure
Description: Ensure naming conventions and folder structure are consistent.

Title: B.16 - Update code comments
Description: Update comments on modified code. Ensure GameController is well-documented.

Title: C.1 - Set up Firebase project
Description: Create/configure Firebase project for Re-Word. Enable required services.

Title: C.2 - Implement anonymous auth
Description: Silent anonymous auth on first launch. User plays immediately without signup.

Title: C.3 - Implement Apple Sign-in
Description: Apple Sign-in integration - required for iOS App Store submission.

Title: C.4 - Implement Google Sign-in
Description: Google Sign-in integration for Android users.

Title: C.5 - Implement account linking
Description: Anonymous account can be linked to real account (Apple/Google/Email).

Title: C.6 - Email/password auth (optional)
Description: Add email/password option if desired. Lower priority than social login.

Title: C.7 - Backend: Update auth to validate Firebase tokens
Description: Modify app/auth.py to verify Firebase ID tokens instead of custom tokens.

Title: C.8 - Enable Firebase App Check
Description: Protect API endpoints from abuse. Configure attestation providers.

Title: C.9 - Set up Firebase Remote Config
Description: Enable remote feature flags, trial duration control, maintenance mode.

Title: C.10 - Define Remote Config defaults
Description: Set sensible offline defaults for all remote config values.

Title: C.11 - Set up Firebase Cloud Messaging
Description: Enable push notifications for daily reminders (optional).

Title: C.12 - Integrate RevenueCat SDK
Description: Add RevenueCat for handling Apple/Google IAP.

Title: C.13 - Configure Apple IAP product
Description: Create $2.99 one-time purchase product in App Store Connect.

Title: C.14 - Configure Google Play product
Description: Create $2.99 one-time purchase product in Google Play Console.

Title: C.15 - Implement 7-day trial logic
Description: Device-based trial tracking. Trial expires after 7 days from first launch.

Title: C.16 - Implement purchase flow UI
Description: Purchase prompt, confirmation, and thank you screens.

Title: C.17 - Handle restore purchases
Description: Allow users to restore purchases on new device.

Title: C.18 - RevenueCat webhook to backend
Description: Backend receives purchase events and marks user as paid.

Title: C.19 - Unlock leaderboard for paid users
Description: Leaderboard access gated by purchase status.

Title: C.20 - Safe username for leaderboards
Description: Username picker with profanity filter (existing code can be reused).

Title: C.21 - Set up Firebase App Distribution
Description: Configure beta testing distribution for iOS and Android.

Title: C.22 - Set up TestFlight
Description: Configure TestFlight for iOS beta distribution.

Title: C.23 - Set up Google Play internal testing
Description: Configure internal testing track for Android beta.

Title: D.1 - Design timed mode rules
Description: Define how timed mode works: duration, scoring multipliers, win conditions.

Title: D.2 - Implement timer UI component
Description: Countdown timer displayed during timed mode gameplay.

Title: D.3 - Implement timed mode scoring
Description: Score multiplier based on speed. Bonus points for fast completion.

Title: D.4 - Separate timed mode leaderboard
Description: Different leaderboard for timed mode vs classic mode.

Title: D.5 - Word spelling visual feedback
Description: Show word being spelled as tiles are selected. Display current word in progress.

Title: D.6 - Visual tile connections
Description: Draw visual connection between selected adjacent tiles.

Title: D.7 - Valid/invalid word feedback
Description: Clear visual feedback when word is valid vs invalid.

Title: D.8 - Sound effects (optional)
Description: Add optional sound effects for tile selection, word completion.

Title: D.9 - Haptic feedback on mobile
Description: Subtle haptic feedback on tile tap and word submission.

Title: D.10 - Animation polish
Description: Smooth animations for tile selection, word submission, score updates.

Title: D.11 - Accessibility review
Description: Ensure game is accessible (color contrast, screen readers, etc).
